name: Valley Adventures RPG
description:
Adventures of the valley, is an RPG video game that consists of defeating Latin American mythological beings. For this you will have special powers that will help you during the journey.

Collect fragments to use and survive, including magical portals, potions, and items that will serve you on your adventure.

One of the best games made with Mz.

The video speaks for its self. Play it now!

Requirements:

  - Español - English - 日本

Demo available
